command.headquarters_location: Not yet deployed to North Africa (forming in Germany)

tanks.note: Division designated Q1 1941 but not yet formed. Deployed to North Africa Q2 1941.

temperature_range_c: Not applicable - division forming in Germany
weather_impact: Not applicable - division not yet operational in North Africa Q1 1941

combat_status.status: Division designated but not yet formed for North Africa deployment
combat_status.notes: 21st Panzer Division designated Q1 1941 for Afrikakorps but not deployed until Q2 1941 (April-May). Division formed from 5. leichte Division which arrived Q1. For Q1 1941 operational data, see 5. leichte Division.

historical_notes.deployment: Division redesignated from 5. leichte Division in Q2 1941, not operational Q1
historical_notes.formation: 21st Panzer Division formed Q2 1941 by reorganization of 5. leichte Division which deployed to North Africa February-March 1941.

sources.name: Tessin Band 6 - Deutsche Verb√§nde und Truppen 1918-1939

notes: 21st Panzer Division NOT operational in Q1 1941

Q1 1941: 5. leichte Division was the operational unit (see separate file)
